name: Applying Passivhaus in different climatic zones around the world
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: The Passivhaus standard has gone international and is used to create low energy buildings in hot and cold climates. The Passivhaus approach has been adapted to work in 6 different climatic zones, this session explores how these work and is illustrated with case studies.

presentations.name: Passivhaus in hot and cold climates - exploring the 6 Passivhaus zones and how adaptable passivhaus is to global warming
presentations.speakers:
David Gale, Gale & Snowden (Devonshire Gate Project)
Bill Gething, (about to release a book)
Kym Mead, Low Carbon Design, BRE
